channel.title: Comments on: New – Oracle VM Template for MySQL Enterprise Edition
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Daniël - the reason is that the latest GA version was used during script development and QA and then the decision taken not to swap it out.
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
Daniël – the reason is that the latest GA version was used during script development and QA and then the decision taken not to swap it out.

Andrew.

item.title: By: Daniël van Eeden

item.description: I wonder why they didn't choose to use OEL 6.1…
item.content:encoded: I wonder why they didn’t choose to use OEL 6.1…
